[Ahringer]: http://www.us.lifesciences.sourcebioscience.com/clone-products/non-mammalian/c-elegans/c-elegans-rnai-library/
[Ensembl]: http://www.ensembl.org/Caenorhabditis_elegans

[PANTHER]: http://pantherdb.org
[R]: https://www.r-project.org
[WormBase]: http://www.wormbase.org

*C. elegans* genome annotations assembled from [WormBase][], [Ensembl][], and [PANTHER][]. RNAi clone mapping support for [ORFeome][], [Ahringer][] and cherrypick libraries.

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/steinbaugh/worminfo.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/steinbaugh/worminfo)

# Installation

This is an [R][] data package.

To install, run `devtools::install_github("steinbaugh/worminfo")`

# Annotations

- `r numGenes` gene annotations
- `r numClones` RNAi clones

Compiled from these sources:

- `r build$wormbase`
- `r build$ensembl`
- `r build$panther`

Built with `r build$rstats`.
